title: Fruit Basket And Cover, 2011-37-1-a,b, 1890–1910
markings: BELLEEK CO FERMANAGH impressed into white strip on base
provenance: Owned by the aunt of the donor, who was born in Ireland, but married the donor's uncle in Indiana in about 1910. She left it to the present owner.
creditline: Gift of Suzanne W. Todd in Memory of William & Beatrice Votaw
description: oval form, with pierced latticework body, the rim and cover encrusted with flowers, clovers, and thistles, with branch-form handles at the ends
